raw_body:
THUYACONTHA – CHITHRA – Beloved wife of late Hemendra Thuyacontha,​ beloved mother of Kosala and Sampath,​ mother-in-law of Anjalika and Rasika,​ grandmother of Cheranjana,​ Duleka,​Mahasen and Siyum,​ grandmother-in-law of Kyle Benjamin,​ great grandmother of Lily Yasodara passed away. Remains lie at Restpect Jayaratne Funeral Parlour from 6.00 p.m. on 30th Jan. Cremation at Borella Kanatte New Section at 5.30 p.m. on 31st Jan.
006745
